reviews.sentence: Great stay. I will return to this Hilton Garden Inn clean room great staff. Room service was excellent and food was top rate. No problems there never are any problems. The staff was extremely friendly and always making sure that your stay was pleasurable and met my expectations.

Poor bedding. The bed and pillows were very uncomfortable. We could hear people in the hall all night long. The room was very clean but for the price we paid I would have expected quiet rooms. The website also guaranteed a 2 pm checkout for AARP members but they did not want to honor that.

Difficult to Find but Excellent Customer Service. Front desk housekeeping and restaurant staff were all courteous friendly and very helpful. Breakfast was great variety of fresh fruits. Omelets were perfectly cooked. The lady server was johnny on the spot. she refilled your water coffee and juice. A real bonus for this hotel is a new Bubas restaurant that opened just across the street. huge sandwiches tasty and very reasonably price. Would stay their again and would recommend this hotel to fellow travelers.
Great Hotel. Hotel room was excellent comfortable great linens. Breakfast the next day was reasonably priced and great with large selection. Easy to get to off Interstate for travelling. As above.

Business trip. Room was very clean nice and very quiet for sleeping. Staff were polite and helpful. this was a great stay. The restaurant was very good and reasonably priced. Nice amenities too indoor pool. All electronics in the room worked great and the in room control for the temperature was great not noisy.
Very good. Wished they have offer free breakfast for the price we pay.
Very nice place to stop for the night. Staff were very friendly and seemed eager to help. Having to pay for breakfast.

The stay with this hotel would have been better if they offered free breakfast. 1095 for breakfast is a little high especially for the price of 212 for a night. The pool was nt as clean as I would have expected and when we asked for extra towels for our shower the next morning we were told they were out. We probably wo nt be back simply because we could have stayed somewhere else for a little cheaper and free breakfast.

Family Weekend. Property was well located right of the highway near shops entertainment. Rooms were quite dingy and not the expected Hilton quality. Noisy hallways poor housekeeping services. Front desk attendants were polite and helpful so I tried not to complain too much. Rates were very expensive not a great value for the quality of my room.

late check out not allowed in tournament weekend. Our soccer tournament was canceled on Saturday and Sunday in Indy but were not notified until Saturday at 20 pm. The Hilton Garden would not allow us a late check out and therefore we were charged for the Saturday night even though we left for home.
Hilton Garden Inn Fishers IN. Overall the stay was nice. The beds were tough to get comfortable on. I was surprised to find that the cost of the room did not include a breakfast like other hotels.
This property is under construction had to park way around the back. HIgh price for something under constructoin. does not look as nice as photo.

Horrible Customer Service. We booked this hotel through a large block of rooms for a nearby sporting event. Two days prior to my arrival I called the hotel and spoke to a female and asked if I could use my Hilton Honors rewards points to reduce the rate of the room and she said yes. She also told me that I could use them when I arrived and to just tell the receptionist I had points and give them the rewards number and they would reduce the rate accordingly. The day of my arrival I informed the male clerk of the points and he told me that it could only be done online and that he could not help me. I told him the female told me differently and he just said she gave you misinformation. At that point we were up for many hours and I needed the room so I asked how I could use my points. He just said you can go online and book the room if there are any available. He refused to help me in any way and I tried to book through the mobile ap but it kept coming up an error. I showed him the error and asked for his help. He said he could not help and moved on to the next guest in line. I had no choice but to accept the room at the higher price. Once in my room I called the customer service number and she re booked my room and allowed me to use my points after sitting on the phone mainly hold for over 20 minutes. She said she had to call the hotel to make sure they were good with that. From start to finish the booking process was HORRIBLE. The clerk did not help me and did not want to provide any assistance on allowing me to use the points or guide me through the process. Then when I checked into the room there was trash between the bed and the wall potato chip bags a baby formula measuring cup and some candy wrappers. The door to the bathroom was a barn style door on rollers and when you shut the door the door would fall off of the roller and would not allow you to open it unles you physically picked up the door and moved it so you could not shut the door while in the bathroom. I was very unsatisfied with the customer service and room and told our team that in future stays I will not be staying at any Hilton. They indicated they would stay elsewhere too so the team could stay together. I was also told by the customer service lady that someone from corporate care would call me on Monday to follow up on my issue and see about comping a room for a night in the future. Guess what. No call on Monday which is not a surprise giving the customer service culture. Definitely not worth the price.

Billing Issues. I booked a room for a consultant that I had staying in town for a week so I can not speak to the actual room. My consultant was very unhappy with the attitude of the front desk when she checked in. They have now charged me over 160 on top of my actual bill and no one can seem to figure out why or rectify these charges. My situation was escalated to the operation manger who promised me the three extra charges totaling over 160 that were pending on my account would drop off I check my account today and the charges did officially go through and did not drop off the manager can not seem to answer or figure this billing out. Very disappointed in the lack of customer service and concern from this hotel and recommend everyone check their cards very carefully after staying here.

I will NEVER AGAIN visit this location. I liked the location breakfast offerings and the pool which my 3 children were only able to swim in for about 20 minutes of our entire 4 day trip we had planned there which was completely rude the janitor was pouring chemicals in the pool while my kids were still IN THE POLThe checkin process was completely ridiculous We arrived a little late and basically the two front desk girls that were extremely rude and atrocious kept us from getting our room because their computers were updating for almost 4 hours they reminded me of the mean girls cast the way they were condescending to my kids and etc. Once we finally got in the room 5 am i believe. the kids slept for like half hour before they said they would open pool early for TROUBLES. and so we came down and there was these janitors cleaning out the hot tub and said we will be cleaning the pool in about 20 minutes which was ridiculous. This stay was one of the worst that I have ever stayed the guy came back and starting pouring in the chemicals while my kids were IN THE POOL. I said a few words to him and told the kids to get out they had rashes on their legs for a few days after that. ALERT PAY ATTENTION PEOPLE.
